variants.Description in input context: I2020T mutation in the kinase domain of LRRK2

Material used.Material Name: Not specified (assumed to be human cell line)
Material used.Description: Experiments involved hydrogen peroxide-induced apoptosis and proteolysis inhibitor treatment.

Readout description.Result Description: I2020T mutant showed reduced protective effect against hydrogen peroxide-induced apoptosis, which was partially restored by proteolysis inhibitors.
Knockdown of wild-type LRRK2 reduced protective effect against apoptosis.

Biological replicates.Description: Replicates not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Replicates not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type LRRK2 was used as a positive control for protective function.

Basic negative control.Description: Proteolysis inhibitor-treated cells or knockdown controls were used as experimental controls.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protective effect â‰¥ 80% compared to control cells

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protective effect < 50% compared to control cells
